mapper.select: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, province, city, area, phone, sex, email from t_customer where customer_id = #{customerId}
select address_id, customer_id, province, city, area, phone, email, detailed_address, consignee from t_user_address where customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_address( customer_id, province, city, area, phone, email, detailed_address, consignee ) values (#{userAddress.customerId}, #{userAddress.province}, #{userAddress.city}, #{userAddress.area}, #{userAddress.phone}, #{userAddress.email}, #{userAddress.detailedAddress}, #{userAddress.consignee})
mapper.update: update t_user_address set province=#{userAddress.province}, city=#{userAddress.city}, area=#{userAddress.area}, phone=#{userAddress.phone}, email=#{userAddress.email}, detailed_address=#{userAddress.detailedAddress}, consignee= #{userAddress.consignee} where address_id=#{userAddress.addressId} and customer_id = #{userAddress.customerId}
